meanings.sent1: The darklings forest creatures moved silently through the night.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with darklings shadows as the sun set.
meanings.sent3: The darklings shadows seemed to dance playfully around the room.
meanings.sent4: The darklings clouds covered the moon, hiding its light.
meanings.sent5: The darklings alley was a mysterious and eerie place at night.

meanings.sent1: The darklings of the forest emerged from their hiding spots.
meanings.sent2: The darklings scurried away as the light approached.
meanings.sent3: The darklings creatures whispered secrets in the night.
meanings.sent4: The darklings of the deep sea were rarely seen by humans.
meanings.sent5: The darklings bats flew silently through the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The room was left in darklings silence after the power outage.
meanings.sent2: The darklings night enveloped the city in a blanket of black.
meanings.sent3: The darklings room felt cozy and safe with the curtains drawn.
meanings.sent4: The darklings sky was filled with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The darklings cave provided shelter from the storm outside.
